definitions.definition: A low - pitched , resonant sound , such as of an explosion .

examples: You should prepare for the coming boom in the tech industry.

definitions.definition: ( economics , business ) A period of prosperity , growth, progress, or high market activity.
One of the calls of certain monkeys or birds .
( computer chess , slang ) An instance of booming .

main_definition: A low - pitched , resonant sound , such as of an explosion .
secondary_definitions: ( economics , business ) A period of prosperity , growth, progress, or high market activity.
One of the calls of certain monkeys or birds .
( computer chess , slang ) An instance of booming .

definitions.definition: A spar extending the foot of a sail ; a spar rigged outboard from a ship 's side to which boats are secured in harbour .
A movable pole used to support a microphone or camera .
A microphone supported on such a pole.
A horizontal member of a crane or derrick , used for lifting.
The longest element of a Yagi antenna , on which the other, smaller ones are transversally mounted.
A floating barrier used to obstruct navigation, for military or other purposes; or used for the containment of an oil spill or to control the flow of logs from logging operations.
A wishbone -shaped piece of windsurfing equipment.
The section of the arm on a backhoe closest to the tractor .
A gymnastics apparatus similar to a balance beam.

main_definition: ( sailing ) A spar extending the foot of a sail ; a spar rigged outboard from a ship 's side to which boats are secured in harbour .
secondary_definitions: A movable pole used to support a microphone or camera .
( by extension ) A microphone supported on such a pole.
A horizontal member of a crane or derrick , used for lifting.
( electronics ) The longest element of a Yagi antenna , on which the other, smaller ones are transversally mounted.
A floating barrier used to obstruct navigation, for military or other purposes; or used for the containment of an oil spill or to control the flow of logs from logging operations.
A wishbone -shaped piece of windsurfing equipment.
The section of the arm on a backhoe closest to the tractor .
A gymnastics apparatus similar to a balance beam.
